elements.name: Create a new computer in the database

steps.name: I open the herokuapp main page
I click add new computer
I fill computer name as "test-computer-1"
I fill the introduced date with "2018-08-12"
I fill the discontinued date with "2018-08-12"
I choose the company "Xerox"
I click create computer
I should see a message with "Done! Computer test-computer-1 has been created"

elements.name: Create a computer only with the title

steps.name: I open the herokuapp main page
I click add new computer
I fill computer name as "test-computer-2"
I click create computer
I should see a message with "Done! Computer test-computer-2 has been created"

elements.name: Verify that the computer name is a mandatory field

steps.name: I open the herokuapp main page
I click add new computer
I click create computer
I should see a warning error

elements.name: Verify that a wrong introduced date should show an error

steps.name: I open the herokuapp main page
I click add new computer
I fill computer name as "test-computer-3"
I fill the introduced date with "2015-00-00"
I click create computer
I should see a warning error

elements.name: Verify that a wrong introduced date should show an error

steps.name: I open the herokuapp main page
I click add new computer
I fill computer name as "test-computer-3"
I fill the introduced date with "12-08-2018"
I click create computer
I should see a warning error

elements.name: Verify that a wrong discontinued date should show a warning error

steps.name: I open the herokuapp main page
I click add new computer
I fill computer name as "test-computer-4"
I fill the discontinued date with "2015-00-00"
I click create computer
I should see a warning error

elements.name: Verify that a wrong discontinued date should show a warning error

steps.name: I open the herokuapp main page
I click add new computer
I fill computer name as "test-computer-4"
I fill the discontinued date with "12-08-2018"
I click create computer
I should see a warning error

elements.name: Delete a computer from the database shows a message

steps.name: I open the herokuapp main page
I have a "Apple Inc." computer with name "test-computer-10" with introduced date "2018-08-11" and discontinued date "2018-09-11"
I look for the computer "test-computer-10"
I open the computer view for the computer "test-computer-10"
I click delete this computer
I should see a message with "Done! Computer has been deleted"

elements.name: Deleted computer is not listed in the main page

steps.name: I open the herokuapp main page
I have a "Apple Inc." computer with name "test-computer-11" with introduced date "2018-08-11" and discontinued date "2018-09-11"
I look for the computer "test-computer-11"
I open the computer view for the computer "test-computer-11"
I click delete this computer
I should see a message with "Done! Computer has been deleted"
I look for the computer "test-computer-11"
I should see the following message "Nothing to display"

elements.name: Edit computer view shows the delete button

steps.name: I open the herokuapp main page
I have a "Apple Inc." computer with name "test-computer-12" with introduced date "2018-08-11" and discontinued date "2018-09-11"
I look for the computer "test-computer-12"
I open the computer view for the computer "test-computer-12"
I should see the delete button present
I open the herokuapp main page
I have a "Apple Inc." computer with name "test-computer-5" with introduced date "2018-08-11" and discontinued date "2018-09-11"
I look for the computer "test-computer-5"
I open the computer view for the computer "test-computer-5"
I should see the attribute company with "Apple Inc."
I should see the attribute introduced date with "2018-08-11"
I should see the attribute discontinued date with "2018-09-11"

elements.name: Update a computer from the database shows a message

steps.name: I open the herokuapp main page
I have a "Apple Inc." computer with name "test-computer-6" with introduced date "2018-08-11" and discontinued date "2018-09-11"
I look for the computer "test-computer-6"
I open the computer view for the computer "test-computer-6"
I fill the introduced date with "2018-09-10"
I click save this computer
I should see a message with "Done! Computer test-computer-6 has been updated"

elements.name: Update a computer from the database and validates its fields

steps.name: I open the herokuapp main page
I have a "Apple Inc." computer with name "test-computer-7" with introduced date "2018-08-11" and discontinued date "2018-09-11"
I look for the computer "test-computer-7"
I open the computer view for the computer "test-computer-7"
I fill the introduced date with "2018-09-10"
I click save this computer
I should see a message with "Done! Computer test-computer-7 has been updated"
I look for the computer "test-computer-7"
I open the computer view for the computer "test-computer-7"
I should see the attribute introduced date with "2018-09-10"

elements.name: Verify that a computer cant be updated with wrong introduced date

steps.name: I open the herokuapp main page
I have a "Apple Inc." computer with name "test-computer-8" with introduced date "2018-08-11" and discontinued date "2018-09-11"
I look for the computer "test-computer-8"
I open the computer view for the computer "test-computer-8"
I fill the introduced date with "2018-13-10"
I click save this computer
I should see a warning error

I look for the computer "test-computer-8"

I fill the introduced date with "12-08-2018"
I click save this computer
